properties.name: label
properties.description: Label on floating button, this is activated in case of block=square

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type of button : default, theme-color, theme-backgroundcolor, green, red, yellow

properties.name: relative
properties.description: Place floating buttong at relative position

properties.name: block
properties.description: Display button as round or square

properties.name: vertical-position
properties.description: Poistion floating button vertically: top or bottom or center. This attribute is ignored if user specify position explicitly (using position-top/position-bottom/position-left/position-right)

properties.name: horizontal-position
properties.description: Poistion floating button horizontally: left or right or center. This attribute is ignored if user specify position explicitly (using position-top/position-bottom/position-left/position-right)

properties.name: position-top
properties.description: Takes top position in percentage or pixel

properties.name: position-bottom
properties.description: Takes bottom position in percentage or pixel

properties.name: position-right
properties.description: Takes right position in percentage or pixel

properties.name: position-left
properties.description: Takes left position in percentage or pixel

events.name: onClick
events.description: Fire when button click, not fired in case button is disabled.
